com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate
Class EntityClassTranslator<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.AbstractTranslator<T>
      com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.MapNodeTranslator<T>
          com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.ClassTranslator<T>
              com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.EntityClassTranslator<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyMetadata<T>, Translator<T>
public class EntityClassTranslator<T>
extends ClassTranslator<T>
implements KeyMetadata<T>

Translator which can maps the root of an entity. There is no factory associated with this; you just instantiate one as necessary.

Author:
Jeff Schnitzer

initEntity

public com.google.appengine.api.datastore.Entity initEntity(T pojo)
Description copied from interface: KeyMetadata

This hides all the messiness of trying to create an Entity from an object that:

  • Might have a long id, might have a String name
  • If it's a Long id, might be null and require autogeneration
  • Might have a parent key

Specified by:
initEntity in interface KeyMetadata<T>
Returns:
an empty Entity object whose key has been set but no other properties.

Gets a key composed of the relevant id and parent fields in the object.

Specified by:
getRawKey in interface KeyMetadata<T>

pojo - must be of the entityClass type for this metadata.
